definition: to establish as separate entities/to divide (a company etc) into independent entities/discrete/separate/separation (of powers etc)

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately

sentences.english: This separation of powers between the Executive and the Legislature is part of the constitution's checks and balances.
sentences.chinese: 這是行政立法兩權分立相互制衡的憲政架構。

sentences.english: We are much too apt to look at schism in our church as an unmitigated evil.
sentences.chinese: 我們太容易把自己教會中的分立看成是十惡不赦的。

sentences.english: Moreover, a detailed discussion is made on the flaw due to applying separable components or elements to thermometric systems for vacuum metallurgy plant.
sentences.chinese: 詳細論述了真空爐測溫系統用分立元件法檢定弊端。

sentences.english: The national government of Nanjing implements the separation of the five branches system.
sentences.chinese: 南京國民政府實行五權分立的五院體制。

sentences.english: This method can be applied to other ones as well.
sentences.chinese: 這一方法也適用於其它分立元件的勵磁調節裝置。

sentences.english: Why do we have three branches of government?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼我們要有三權分立的政府？

sentences.english: The present and future continents north and south, with the isthmus.
sentences.chinese: 現在與未來的大陸在南北分立中間則有着地峽。

sentences.english: The realization of the DTMF circuit using discrete components was presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 給出了雙音多頻發送電路的分立元件實現方法。

sentences.english: Thought of "Separation of Three Powers" is important contents of Sun Yat-sen's Principle of Democracy.
sentences.chinese: 五權分立思想是孫中山民權主義的重要內容。

sentences.english: Democritus argued that matter is formed from discrete particles.
sentences.chinese: 德謨克利特認爲物質是由分立的粒子構成的。

sentences.english: OK Is everyone seeing that? Yeah, pretty much. OK.
sentences.chinese: 分立的各個譜線，有看到的嗎？有很多。

sentences.english: Excavations can be intersected by multiple discrete faults (non-planar and gouge filled) that slip and open.
sentences.chinese: 挖掘可以相交的多個分立故障的支路和開放。

sentences.english: The exchange shifts the rapid elevator early phase bulk are that the discrete component is dominateeed .
sentences.chinese: 交流調速電梯早期大多數是分立元件控制。

sentences.english: We can forget about the fact that the energies are discrete.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以忽略這些能量是分立的。

sentences.english: You can use spare sockets to try out different discrete component values.
sentences.chinese: 您可以使用備用插座，測試不同的分立元件值。

sentences.english: Then discussion initiation building ordinance 34th related administration technology separation.
sentences.chinese: 進而引發建築法第34條有關行政技術分立之探討。

definition: to exist side by side/to exist simultaneously
to mix up/to confuse one thing with another
one divides into two/to be two-sided/there are two sides to everything/to see both sb's good points and shortcomings (idiom)
to stand respectfully/(of trees, mountains) standing tall and majestic
to divide into rows/to identify subcategories/to break down into constituent parts/breakdown/disaggregation
to stop/to halt/halt!/to hold resolutely (of a view, an aspiration etc)
